title: Ep. 170 - The Left Suspends Rules Of Identity Politics Again
description:
Ellen Degeneres is being attacked for defending Kevin Hart. But, according to the rules of identity politics, how can anyone criticize a gay woman’s defense of a black man? Also, Christian Bale thanked Satan at the Golden Globes. It was the most honest moment in the history of Hollywood. Date: 01-07-2019
